title: Spring Split 2017: NA LCS tickets on sale for Week 5
body: Want to watch the live action of the NA LCS during Week 5 on Feb. 17-19? Head over to the Tickets Page for ticket links and more information about visiting the NA LCS Studio. The final schedule for Week 5 is available on the Schedule Page and listed below.

replies.body: Does playoffs include finals?  Meaning will finals tickets also be going on sale of February 8th? and is it general admission, or does your ticket come assigned with a seat?

To clarify, only the Spring Playoffs stages that take place at the NA LCS studio (Quarterfinals and Semifinals) will go on sale on Feb 8. As we [previously announced](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/na-spring-finals-going-vancouver-bc), NA Spring Finals tickets will begin around mid month. We'll share everything you need to know to buy NA Spring Finals tickets in a separate article so stay tuned to Lolesports. Hope to see you at Spring Finals, Princess Zyna!
Thank you for the clarification! I am planning on being there, I cannot wait!

hang on a minute, the schedule is wrong and here's why:
TSM already played C9 in W1D1, TSM has not played FlyQuest yet?
Why is TSM playing C9 Twice before the 2nd round robin?
Any ideas?
